website_summaries.verdict: A sleek design that produces a quality pot of coffee in a snap.
pros: Has a pause and serve feature so you can stop brewing to pour a cup
Includes a permanent filter so you never need a paper filter again
Heating plate keeps coffee warm and the cord can be stored under the unit
cons: Pricey and there is no auto shut-off feature, so you need to remember to turn it off after you're done using it

customer_reviews.title: Looks great - one button operation - easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I have a small guesthouse and ordered several of these as a test. I got the standard version without all the programming and the guests love them. Just fill the water, add coffee, position the carafe and push the button. Housekeeping likes the flat sides and top that are much easier to clean then the many curved surfaces of most coffee-makers. Also, the choice of colors allows matching to decor - making the rooms look much more unified and gives the impression that this is a more expensive 'custom' upgrade to the rooms. Will update after more feedback - but looks like I'll be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Gungo

customer_reviews.title: I did like it...
customer_reviews.text: I love the retro style of it and color.. BUT after a few (4) months of light use (we alternate between this and the K-cups) it's not working right. Doesn't brew right and seems clogged, but it not clogged. Heavy amount of coffee grounds in your coffee; making it gross, and wasting the coffee. It was good for about 6 pots of coffee, will just end up in a landfill. I'm really bummed
customer_reviews.author: JBWCupcake

customer_reviews.title: Bella don't let you product go down the hill...
customer_reviews.text: I had another purple coffee maker that last me for 3 1/2 years. I loved it ! Ordered another purple on and it broke in less than a month :( . I'm ordering again with a warranty and if it breaks I will never get another Bella again .
customer_reviews.author: JANE IRISH

customer_reviews.title: JUNK to say the least
customer_reviews.text: This coffee pot isnt as nice looking in person as in the photos. The silver is plastic & very dull. On top of that after 5-6 weeks it no longer works. I bought this as a replacement & now am having to purchase a new one again. Not only did the warmer stop working but so did the whole unit. Even turned on the water would no longer run through it & when picked it up all water began running out of the bottom. I will not purchase another one
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: No Longer Stays On Forever
customer_reviews.text: I had this coffee maker for the past year and then broke the carafe so I ordered a whole new unit. To my dismay I found that the new version being shipped now has auto 2 hour turn-off. This is very disappointing as it was one of the reasons that made this machine unique in the market. The new version now automatically turns off after 2 hours of keeping the coffee hot. It still makes very hot coffee which was always a great feature. Bella - I am very unhappy that my coffee now gets cold after 2 hours!
customer_reviews.author: R. Kloc

customer_reviews.title: It broke after six months.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this six months after I bought it. Most coffee makers last a year or two or even longer. I don’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pb40

customer_reviews.title: 5 Weeks and then broke!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was perfect in every way and I loved it... for exactly 5 weeks. D &H Distributing will not let me return it for replacement, I am assuming because it did work for 30 days. Even so, if they can't make this right, I won't be making purchases with them again.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystelle Barry

customer_reviews.title: How is it possible that this brews coffee that is cold.
customer_reviews.text: Fill the tank, put in filter and coffee, plug it in and go take a shower. I come back 10 minutes later to a full pot of coffee that is still or already cold. Have to warm in microwave to Make it acceptable. Going back to my percolator.
customer_reviews.author: Elena S.

customer_reviews.title: We really like this coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: We really like this coffee maker. I do not l like the coffee makers with clocks, etc. on them. The color looks awesome against our backsplash. The only negative is that it does not shut off automatically. (Ironically, that would be the complaint I had of one's that DID shut off after 2 hours...and I was d drinking slower that morning) No worries, my husband and I usually finish the pot in about 1 hour.....
customer_reviews.author: pk7336

customer_reviews.title: great look
customer_reviews.text: I got the blue. It looks fantastic. I had white before. I buy these for the look. As a coffee maker is mediocre. Lol also the no auto shut off is so lame. Even a 10 dollar one from dollar general has auto shut off. Dont buy this if youre main focus is features. It has none. this is perfect for someone who wants an appliance that adds a cool look to ur kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M. Pettersen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Simple Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bright purple coffee maker. While it is a pretty simple machine with only one button I really love this machine. It is actually nice to have something in my kitchen that doesn't take a rocket scientist to program. The price was great and it matches all my purple in the kitchen. Will be buying more from this line for sure.
customer_reviews.author: alaina smith

customer_reviews.title: A Keeper for the Counter
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth Bella coffee maker purchased in our family over the past three years and we love the beautiful colors. Don't generally keep a lot of appliances on the counter, but this one is a keeper. Bonus is that it makes great coffee as well!
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bella coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker exceeds everything that was stated about it. I am delighted with my purchase, and have been using it now for a while, and love it. It's one of the best coffee makers I've ever used and looks great. I only have one regret, I wish I had ordered one in color, I think I would've loved the orange one, but, decided to stick with black.
customer_reviews.author: Trivona Stegman

customer_reviews.title: Green is my color;  so tired of BLACK appliances.
customer_reviews.text: I chose this pot because the program-able version had the 2 hour shut-off and I hate those . . . when I'm ready for the 2nd or 3rd cup of coffee, it's cold and it's silly to have to restart it. I am hoping it's as good as the other discounting the automation because I'm basically a BUNN girl . . . just needed a second pot because I gave the second to someone who had none at all.
customer_reviews.author: Heart

customer_reviews.title: Simple quality.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, and as simple to operate as it gets. No automation at all, basically it's just got a simple on/off switch and that's it. Looks great in our kitchen, brews faster than most, color options are fantastic, no electronics to break down, not even a clock. One switch and one LED, perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Enigma

customer_reviews.title: Totally awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker. It makes enough for me and my roommates to have coffee every morning without having to make a second pot. The color is great, and less blue than pictured, which I am really happy about. The only thing I wish it had was an automatic shutoff.
customer_reviews.author: EmJ

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and easy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker. It's adorable and easy to use. The only issue is there is no safety timer/shutoff--so if I don't finish the pot right away I start to smell burning coffee after about 2 hours--and it gets HOT!! Like almost boiling! But as long as you're vigilant that isn't too big of a deal I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Megan C.

customer_reviews.title: I didn't realize when I bought this that it does ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize when I bought this that it does not have auto turn off. We are heavy coffee drinkers in our house of 4 adults. Lately the coffee has a burned taste when we make it, I have cleaned the coffee pot regularly but does not help. I did buy a timer for the wall plug that turns of power after set time.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coffee every time
customer_reviews.text: just like my old one- It makes perfect coffee every time
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite kitchen appliance
customer_reviews.text: We went years avoiding having a coffee maker in the house, but finally gave in! I'm so glad we went with Bella. The coffee maker is more orange than the mustardy color in the default picture, but it's lovely looking and does the job. It's easy to clean and doesn't require paper filters, which are a great bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: caution!
customer_reviews.text: While I really like the smart design and simple functionality about it, please be aware that it has a very small on/off light that can only be viewed when looking straight into it. You will not notice that it's turned on from an angle. I've left it on overnight and when I've left the house several times. All they have to do is have a bigger light, otherwise this is a potentially dangerous product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Back to basics in red.
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic straightforward machine with no pretense or automation. You turn it on, you turn it off. Good brewer.
customer_reviews.author: Speedo

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Works great and looks great. Also it has the reusable filter so no more paper waste just rinse and reuse. The burner keeps the coffee crazy hot so I turn it off as soon as its done brewing afraid it will burn the drink itself.
customer_reviews.author: amazonfan

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty, doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: This was my second coffee maker. The first one lasted only 5 months, but I really like the appearance so I bought another one and it stopped working. Bella won't get any more of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Collene S Newsome

customer_reviews.title: Attractive but basic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to match my orange Bella Dot toaster and my orange cookware. It looks great and works fine for a very basic coffee maker. It isn't programmable and it doesn't shut itself off automatically so we have to remember to do that before we leave. It doesn't require coffee filters, which is nice. The coffee was muddy at the bottom of the pot until we started using a coarser grind. Overall, it is a fine product for the price. I was just surprised that it didn't automatically shut off after a few hours. I thought they all had that safety feature these days.
customer_reviews.author: Page H.

customer_reviews.title: love the color ànd next the design
customer_reviews.text: Recently, I have had to move my classroom. I had a huge coffee maker in there for all other teachers. Now I have moved up and into an office and need my own coffee maker. First, love the color ànd next the design. my office is colorful and fun...quite the respite from the rest of school. I have the toaster at home ànd I love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Fox

customer_reviews.title: Not retro
customer_reviews.text: No line to measure water. Cheaply looking, made coffee but took a long time. Not fancy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: H.A

customer_reviews.title: Ode to my teal caffeine wonder...
customer_reviews.text: It's one shiny beautiful machine, and it makes a delicious cup of joe. It's very simple, so if you like having lots of buttons, don't buy this one. But if you want an electric beacon of hope in your drab kitchen, then get it. As a side note, I may also have a slightly unhealthy addiction to teal. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Liquidskin

customer_reviews.title: A messy coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: It's really hard to pour water into this thing without getting it all over the counter. Coffee tastes good though.
customer_reviews.author: Actuality

customer_reviews.title: Simple but solid coffee maker. We have had this ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple but solid coffee maker. We have had this for a year and a half with no problems. It does have an auto shutoff.
customer_reviews.author: Jim P

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Good-Looking
customer_reviews.text: It's a coffee maker with one switch. "Make Coffee" or "Don't Make Coffee" What a breath of fresh air in our increasingly complex world. It looks great in our kitchen and as of writing this has given us 1 month of trouble-free daily service. Would definitely recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Sdmanfrom83

customer_reviews.title: Really cool.
customer_reviews.text: This is what it looks like. It is a purple medal coffee maker and it is awesome. I really like it and everyone makes sure to ask where to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: and efficient and best of all it doesn't make the mess that my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is clean, quiet, and efficient and best of all it doesn't make the mess that my husbands last coffee maker did! I love how simple it is to use and the color is amazing! (Obviously the husband thought I was joking when I threw his old one away and told him I ordered him a purple coffee pot... that'll teach him to not clean up his coffee messes!)
customer_reviews.author: Louie Stout

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, low quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item despite reading several reviews that it leaked after a few months of use. My experience has been that yes, the bottom leaks after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Edgerton

customer_reviews.title: did not last two months
customer_reviews.text: i bough this in dec, its not feb, and it has stopped working.... i figured i would get a few years out of it at least, i am pretty disappointed and now have to go buy another coffee pot.... did not last.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coffee pot in August of 2014. I would have expected it to last longer than 18 months - not happy.
customer_reviews.author: K. O.

customer_reviews.title: Bella Dots 12-cup coffee maker in Red
customer_reviews.text: I love this bright and cheerful Red Bella Dots Coffee Maker. I love the simplicity, and replaced a programmable model in my kitchen with this one. This goes so wonderfully with the rest of my red items in my kitchen/dining area.
customer_reviews.author: TRUDY FRIEDMAN

customer_reviews.title: BEST coffee maker EVER
customer_reviews.text: I was one of those people that drove 20 min to Starbucks every morning. Not any more! This coffee maker brews the most delicious coffee at the perfect temperature.
customer_reviews.author: JCrew

customer_reviews.title: but it's pretty sweet and i'd say overall i'm satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot bigger than it looks, but it's pretty sweet and i'd say overall i'm satisfied. I've had it for a bit now and it's a great coffee maker. I'm more than happy.
customer_reviews.author: David Vinson

customer_reviews.title: Have used & also works great. Would recommend this coffee maker for anyone looking ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time & was as described. Have used & also works great. Would recommend this coffee maker for anyone looking for simplicity in brewing along with numerous color options.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Wells

customer_reviews.title: Grape Escape in Irish hill on lake
customer_reviews.text: This cute coffee pot went great with my cottage for the guest that stay at Grape Escape Cottage on Vineyard lake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which is fine since the coffee cups we have do
customer_reviews.text: It is not really the purple in the picture. It is the color of the other products more of a reddish purple. It also doesn't keep the coffee warm at all, which is fine since the coffee cups we have do.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I made 1 pot of coffee and then ti would not work again I would not recommend this product to any one
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in jan and it was in the box till this weekend and it worked only once !!!! I made 1 pot of coffee and then ti would not work again I would not recommend this product to any one
customer_reviews.author: Cathryn Vaine

customer_reviews.title: Simple, good-looking coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Good-looking, easy to clean, gets the job done. This is a no-nonsense coffee maker: one button - BREW. Fill it up and go. Color selection adds a unique twist to the kitchen. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Harlan

customer_reviews.title: awesome! i love this coffee pot
customer_reviews.text: awesome! i love this coffee pot. ive had it over a year now and it still works great. when it goes out i will definitely be getting a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Works quick and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely machine. Works quick and easy to clean. Plus it is the center piece in my kitchen!!
customer_reviews.author: C.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Pot
customer_reviews.text: My favorite coffee pot! The purple color is a little more subdued / less electric than pictured, but it is a funky style and I absolutely love it. The reusable basket is easy to clean, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: water does not get very hot wish i could send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color to match my toaster. One button, easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Dominicandy

customer_reviews.title: The coffee machine was sold as "fuscia" and is red ...
customer_reviews.text: The coffee machine was sold as "fuscia" and is red. The carafe came cracked. No functionality, no auto. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie S

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Middling quality.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard for me to give 3 stars to a device this good looking, but the quality in the 2 units we have, was simply lacking. The first unit's top door would not latch due to poor machining. The replacement unit was better, but it still closes and opens very clunky. I don't wont to bother with a second return. I hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: T-bone85

customer_reviews.title: Great color --- but....
customer_reviews.text: No automatic off .... very cute, fairly fast brewing, good for what it cost. Great color. but probably would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jlee

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews, but I am extremely disappointed in this product. I bought this coffee maker right around Christmas time, and it has already stopped working 3 months later. When I turn it on to brew a pot of coffee, nothing happens. The light comes on and that is it. Better coffee makers out there in the same price range.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Rowley

customer_reviews.title: ugh.....
customer_reviews.text: Product was damaged and missing the permanent filter when I received it. I shipped it back and awaiting the replacement one. I'll update my review once I receive and use my new one.
customer_reviews.author: Crobbins

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Arrived inexcellent condition as always!! Love the product. First coffe pot that does not leak when you pour a cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Denyse Tyson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible broken from box very cheaply made. Sounded like a tornado when turned on.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice.Cheap China junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice.Cheap China junk!!! I bought it for my wife for Christmas. First time we used it was after Christmas and it stopped working completely after 2 months.(the last week of February) I cannot get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love this coffee pot. exactly what i was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Smtih

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOOKS GREAT AND GREEN COLOR HARD TO FIND BREWS COFFEE QUICK 1 BUTTON OPERATION JUST LIKE HOMER SIMPSON
customer_reviews.author: rl

customer_reviews.title: love the color but...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the looks, but there is a problem with the lid. made of plastic with something like aliumniam which catches when opening & closing of the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Verna

customer_reviews.title: Bella
customer_reviews.text: The Bella is aesthetically pleasing (which is what I was looking for) and works well.
customer_reviews.author: GMouse

customer_reviews.title: Buy it because it is pretty, not because it is fancy.
customer_reviews.text: This coffeemaker looks great and that's the #1 reason to buy it. It is not fancy, but it does it's job. I like that it has a reusable filter, so no more need to waste!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Paschall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Coffee Maker!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker, it works great and the color is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Warner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size! My mom said it's the best cup ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast Delivery! Perfect size! My mom said it's the best cup of coffee she has had at that house in 20 years! :o)
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Bella 13786 coffeee maker
customer_reviews.text: The coffee maker makes good coffee. The thing I do not like is, I did not know that they make coffe makers any more that do not shut off automatically. This is a must for safety reasons. I leave for work real early, so I need to rely on my husband to turn it off. So what I had to do was buy a thermo pot to keep the coffee hot, and I don't have to worry if the machine gets turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Renteria

customer_reviews.title: so far so good. also
customer_reviews.text: the top piece has trouble fitting in place sometimes but other than that, so far so good. also...it's purple
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: I hate that and this info was not in the description
customer_reviews.text: There is no auto shut off. I hate that and this info was not in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Oskkar Alchemy

customer_reviews.title: ... and bought the same unit with controls - very good machine.
customer_reviews.text: Returned it and bought the same unit with controls - very good machine.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Cowpoke

customer_reviews.title: while working it was fine. nice looking but will have to return to ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased in march and by july 4th weekend it was not working. the only think working seems to be the light under the brew button. while working it was fine. nice looking but will have to return to my old mr coffee.
customer_reviews.author: E&CinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Its pretty but it won't last long.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this coffee pot on October 10th and received it about 10 days later. I probably made 2 pots of coffee a day since then. Today, November 30th it quit working. It's a beautiful piece of equipment but if you want it to last you a while I wouldn't suggest this product.
customer_reviews.author: ASUN

customer_reviews.title: BELLA COFFE MAKER GREAT
customer_reviews.text: IT'S REALLY BEAUTIFUL HAVING THE COLORS FOR UR KITCHEN. SO FAR,NO PROBLEM WITH IT.THANKS BELLA DON'T THINK THERE R TOO MANY PRODUCTS THAT HAVE COLORS.
customer_reviews.author: lmp

customer_reviews.title: This thing is terrible. Brewed maybe 15 pots of coffee through it ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is terrible. Brewed maybe 15 pots of coffee through it and the heating element went out. It's cheap and not worth half the money. Save yourself the trouble and pass on this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted :/
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on June 20, 2015 & it stopped working today. I only used it on weekends & it was a good item for the length of time I used it but it should have lasted longer than 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Portokalis

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love my coffee maker! It looks and works great! I also have the toaster and it matches it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: tahesha bryant

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: I gave it two stars only because it did work beautifully for a month. Then it completely quit. Very disappointed. I gave it to my sister for a gift--she has a new "red" kitchen and this was perfect to match her other accessories. I will look for another red coffee maker--but not this brand.
customer_reviews.author: aabrock

customer_reviews.title: Makes GREAT Coffee
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for our home in Nevada and loved it so much I bought one for our vacation home as well!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Press brew for on, press it again for off.  Easy as... Coffee?
customer_reviews.text: I like that all I need to do is press 1 button! All I want is coffee in the morning, nothing fancy. I add my coffee and cinnamon, press brew, and go! And it's pink..... Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsie Harlan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my new coffee maker!!! I use it daily so easy just push one button!!! If by any chance I break the pot are there replacements for it?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased late february... just stopped working this ...
customer_reviews.text: 5/17/15 Purchased late february...just stopped working this morning. Light comes on but does not produce coffee...very very upset.. if this cannot be fixed or replaced by vendor I will never order again 5/18/15 called amazon customer service...they emailed me a prepaid label and I will receive a refund once they receive the coffee maker. Ordered the same one again...hoping it lasts longer because it matches my kitchen perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Custodio

customer_reviews.title: Had two of these both fail within 6-months
customer_reviews.text: Worst coffee maker I have ever owned- and also best looking which is why we purchased it. Failed within 6-months. Bella customer service had us mail them the cord from it as part of warranty replacement and replacement was shipped from Canada. Replacement one failed in 6-months as well. Do yourself a favor and spend the money on a better brand. Love the look and the color, but the quality is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Hokie115

customer_reviews.title: Don't like permanent filter, very messy.
customer_reviews.text: Inside permanent basket is a pain to clean, I would prefer to throw out a coffee filter. But, other than that, it works great and looks great in my newly designed kitchen. I love all my Bella products!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila G.

customer_reviews.title: We love this coffee pot
customer_reviews.text: We love this coffee pot! It surly gets its daily use! Has not failed us yet. I do wish it had an auto shut off, but we built in a routine of checking to see if the coffee pot is still on or not after about 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: coffee_pixi_418

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: terrible, would'nt even give it one star :( I believe it was defective, leaked and sprayed water on wall and counter. Had to return, figures was first purchase on amazon, probably wont buy anything again anytime soon if ever.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M Fater

customer_reviews.title: I got my old mister coffee out and it works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: This was my second coffee pot. The first one just stopped working. The second one I sent back because it would not keep the coffee hot. I would not purchase another. I got my old mister coffee out and it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Avgerinos

customer_reviews.title: Purple is my Passion ... Coffee is my Salvation
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen is decorated in purple ... so the reason I bought this product is obvious ... but I can tell you that I love the fact that you don't have to buy filters for this machine ... it has a reusable one. I love that it is easy to clean, easy to fill, easy to start with the single push button without having to figure out how to program it and all that other crap. I love this coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Deakin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty....but faulty after just a few uses
customer_reviews.text: While the design is beautiful, it stopped working after just a dozen uses. The light comes on but no water is heated or comes out.
customer_reviews.author: cat6

customer_reviews.title: needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful but I was very disappointed that there was not an auto shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie

customer_reviews.title: I y happy with my new coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I y happy with my new coffee maker. It's easy,simple to use and really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Pot and such a festive color.
customer_reviews.text: Makes great coffee, simple, no difficult instructions to read or program. Perfect. Pot doesn't drip every time you pour from it.
customer_reviews.author: Mean Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adds a lovely touch of pink to my kitchen and as always, works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Stockard

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker was great until is totally stopped working 8 months after I bought it. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole F.

customer_reviews.title: Better than Mr. Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Coffee is hot even after creamer. Love the brewing choices. Color choice matches kitchen theme perfectly. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Ellenberger

customer_reviews.title: Bella Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: Love it for the price and quality brews quick and quiet I love the color wish I had purchased one with a clock but I like my Bella Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.author: Leena

customer_reviews.title: Pretty coffee pot!
customer_reviews.text: Be careful I didn't read the specs on this and there is not a way to program or even a clock. Nor is there an automatic turn off!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa/phx

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied with my Bella coffee pot
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with my Bella coffee pot. Especially with the color! I have been looking a long time for an orange coffee pot to match the colors in my kitchen. The coffee is hot and I am extremely happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: beth roetman

customer_reviews.title: it does what it needs to do. there's nothing ...
customer_reviews.text: it does what it needs to do. there's nothing fancy about it (other than the way it looks) and the only downside is it doesn't turn itself off.
customer_reviews.author: Ana L. Valente

customer_reviews.title: Great Product except it has an American plug that won't ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Product except it has an American plug that won't work in Australia being electrical outlets and wattage is different
customer_reviews.author: Debora Fairlie

customer_reviews.title: Haven't got most important feature which is auto shut off ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't got most important feature which is auto shut off!!! Very hard to see inside water reservoir!! Why not put reservoir outside so.you can see it!!
customer_reviews.author: deborah sherfield

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great coffee maker. Very easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: CLB

customer_reviews.title: It makes a good cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: It makes a good cup of coffee, doesn't leak or drip, and looks great! I love the reuseable filter and retractable cord. I'm very glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Lois A. Frederiksen

product_meta.title: BELLA 13869 Dots Collection 12-Cup Coffee Maker, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackWith its unique dot texture, gorgeous colors and sleek design BELLA Dots will bring life to your kitchen and make you smile. This 12-Cup Coffee Maker features a convenient pause and serve function as well as a commercial style permanent filter for fuller flavor. For easy cleaning, it includes a removable basket and non-stick heating plate. No longer must you brew coffee with that same old silver and black box. The BELLA Dots Coffee Maker is unique and colorful. Just like you.
feature_bullets: Commercial style permanent filter extracts a full coffee flavor
Removable basket and non-stick heating plate for easy cleaning
